DevOps Engineer

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share
Job Req Type: Experienced
Required Travel: Yes, 25% of the time
Shift Type: 1st Shift/Days

Description:
The Analytics Engineer role is crucial to any organization that aims to harness data insights for informed decision-making. As an Analytics Engineer, the candidate will work with cross-functional teams, including product managers, business analysts, and software engineers, to identify and implement data-driven insights and recommendations. The candidate will ensure data accuracy, consistency, and reliability through data profiling, data quality checks, and data validation. They will participate in code reviews and design sessions to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions. The candidate will also identify and implement improvements to existing analytics processes, infrastructure, and tools. The candidate will need to stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in analytics and data engineering.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
Do you want to be part of a global team?

At Mobven, we are passionate about creating exceptional mobile solutions. Established in 2012, our company has evolved from a startup into an award-winning mobile technology company with offices in Istanbul. Mobven has been awarded as Turkey’s fastest-growing top 50 tech company by Deloitte, 4 years in a row.

We continue our operations as a subsidiary of Payten, the payment solutions arm of Asseco, the 6th largest software house in Europe.
If you are self-motivated and constantly bear in mind how to add value to a company’s future and its products and services, then, we are looking for individuals like you with the ambition to be game-changers in the industry and to create cutting-edge mobile solutions for our multinational clients.

REQUIREMENTS
2+ years of experience in a related role
Familiar with agile software development practices and tools.
Nice to have been familiar with Atlassian products (JIRA, Confluence,..)
Experience with Java or Javascript programming language is a must.
Experience with Selenium WebDriver and Appium automation is a must.
Experience with relational databases. Having basic knowledge about writing SQL queries to validate data loads.
Excellent analytic and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Team player who takes pride in and facilitates the sharing of knowledge.

RESPONSIBILITIES
You will be a part of an agile team.
Responsible for planning, execution, and reporting tests.
Defining, measuring, and improving the quality of the software.
Responsible for delivering test automation frameworks.
You are responsible for working as expected applications.

Description:
Data Engineer
Do you want to be a valued part of the critical infrastructure that serves communities across Europe and beyond? If so, then you could be the newest addition to our team as Data Engineer.

About the role
Be part of the role movement – and play your part.
As a Data Engineer in Data & Analytics, you will become part of an agile team that builds innovative end-to-end data products, using both descriptive and predictive analytics across many exciting business domains within DFDS. You come to be a part of an international team with many nationalities and locations across the EU.
We are an evolving team, where you with the right skill- and mindset, could have a high level of influence on the way solutions are built. We are modernizing our analytics setup; hence you will play a vital role in designing and developing data infrastructure using traditional DWH and ETL technologies but moving towards a cloud-based setup with event streaming and serverless.
As a Data Engineer in Data & Analytics, you will primarily be responsible for building data pipelines (both centralized and decentralized) that support the different business initiatives together with other data engineers, back-end developers, data scientists, and product owners. All from identifying, collecting, and integrating data from various sources to building robust and scalable domain-based data products (on-prem and cloud) for analytical purposes.
You will also require participating in change management initiatives to support the adoption and continuous development of our data solutions and platform.

Key Skills & Competencies Required:

We think the strongest teams are built on diversity and inclusivity. Contrasting opinions, varied skills and strong characters bring out the best in us all. If you think you have this mindset, we invite you to meet with us.

The ideal person for this position will have following qualifications:

Working at DFDS

Join the movement and grow with us.
While you’re with us, we want you to develop and move yourself on. We’ll encourage you to challenge yourself to acquire new skills and perspectives.

Are we a match? Then what are you waiting for? Apply now.

If you think your personality, skills, experience, and ambition match this role, we’d love to hear from you. Send us your resume as soon as possible as we’re keen to meet potential candidates on an ongoing basis.
Is there something you need to know, we haven’t covered here, please do not hesitate to reach out to Hanife Turan on hatua@dfds.com

We look forward to hearing from you.

Company_name: ALKAN İNŞAAT MÜHENDİSLİK TURİZM TAŞ. SAN. VE TİC. LTD. ŞTİ.
Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

The Role
Skyborn Robotics is looking for an engineer to develop computer vision algorithms for our robotic systems. We see two major hurdles to adoption in the robotics industry: cost and ease of use. We’re developing low-cost, AI-powered robots built atop cutting-edge computer vision algorithms to further this thesis.
As a computer vision engineer, you will interact with data from our onboard vision sensors and will perform segmentation, stitching and other algorithms. You’ll be working closely with our core SDK and machine learning engineers to optimize the performance of our vision algorithms and develop innovative solutions for our customers with inspection, 3D reconstruction and other use cases. We’re hiring for all levels from a recent graduate to an experienced senior engineer looking to grow and lead the team. Apply and help us continue to deliver our vision of low-cost, powerful robots driven by computer vision!

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
WHO ARE WE?
Afiniti is the world’s leading applied artificial intelligence and advanced analytics provider. Afiniti Enterprise Behavioral Pairing™ uses artificial intelligence to identify subtle and valuable patterns of human interaction in order to pair individuals on the basis of behavior, leading to more successful interactions and measurable increases in enterprise profitability. Afiniti operates throughout the world, and has measurably driven billions of dollars in incremental value for our clients.
PURPOSE
As a key member of the Data Analytics team, you will enjoy rolling up your sleeves to solve complex business questions through data. You will navigate through unique data sets to build and maintain data pipelines, monitor and optimize data processes, and lead feature engineering for our modeling data sets. Description:
About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Our Exciting Opportunity

We are now looking for an EDA Support Engineer that will provide technical service and support to our customers. In this role, you will troubleshoot and resolve problems to stabilize and optimize customer networks. You will configure and integrate different nodes and solutions in new and live customer networks.

The Support Engineer typically interacts with customer technical staff, operation managers, service engineers and other groups within the Service Delivery organization. You may also interact with groups in sales, R&D, 3rd party suppliers and local authorities.

As there are no distinct borders between the areas, you will need to be flexible and master more than one area. You are expected to travel internationally and work in different cultural environments. The technical development is rapid, and you are responsible for continuously keeping your competence and skills up to date.

Description:
About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Ready to get to know us?
We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. Since then we have grown into a decacorn with a valuation of over $16.5 billion, backed by Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital, and several sovereign wealth funds. Operating with that same energy from the first day, we believe we will achieve our targets and grow even more together!

May the tech be with us.
From day one, we believed that technology is the driver; e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to our dedicated team, we are now one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies in the world! Now we’re a team in our thousands, currently delivering more than 1.5 million packages every day to 27 countries. We offer our 30 million customers a flawless shopping experience.

Company Description

Do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology – with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. Welcome to Bosch.
Every year, several thousands of young people on practical placements with Bosch experience daily work at first hand. Description:
Ready to get to know us?
We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. Since then we have grown into a decacorn with a valuation of over $16.5 billion, backed by Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital, and several sovereign wealth funds. Operating with that same energy from the first day, we believe we will achieve our targets and grow even more together!

May the tech be with us.
From day one, we believed that technology is the driver; e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to our dedicated team, we are now one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies in the world! Now we’re a team in our thousands, currently delivering more than 1.5 million packages every day to 27 countries. We offer our 30 million customers a flawless shopping experience.

General information: Hitachi Energy is the leading provider of mission critical communication products worldwide. We are looking for a professional in the fields of telecommunication products and systems to join our team in Istanbul (Turkey). You will design telecommunication solutions to meet the highest industry standards with regard to availability and reliability of operational and administrative communication systems. A technically challenging position in a multicultural environment awaits you.
Responsibilities: In cooperation with our customers or representatives, you will be responsible for the design and engineering of our telecommunication systems tailored to the requirements of the global energy sector during project execution. In the bidding phase you will support our sales and bid team with a professional design of communication networks based on customer specifications and design institutes. You integrate the customer's telecommunications structure in an optimal overall system. Moreover, you oversee the projects in all phases Occasionally, you travel to project meetings or to presentations at our customers location Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business
Your background: Successful degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent, ideally with specialized knowledge in Telecommunication networks with modern voice and data communication technologies (PLC / SDH / PDH / MPLS / DWDM / VoIP / MW / LTE). Sound knowledge of modern IP based telecommunication technologies. Good command of Russian and English, both verbal and written.. Flexibility and great communication skills as well as interests in working within an international and multicultural environment. In the end, you will surely convince us with great responsibility, innovative solutions and a strong customer orientation

Description:
Our Exciting Opportunity

We are now looking for an EDA Support Engineer that will provide technical service and support to our customers. In this role, you will troubleshoot and resolve problems to stabilize and optimize customer networks. You will configure and integrate different nodes and solutions in new and live customer networks.

The Support Engineer typically interacts with customer technical staff, operation managers, service engineers and other groups within the Service Delivery organization. You may also interact with groups in sales, R&D, 3rd party suppliers and local authorities.

As there are no distinct borders between the areas, you will need to be flexible and master more than one area. You are expected to travel internationally and work in different cultural environments. The technical development is rapid, and you are responsible for continuously keeping your competence and skills up to date.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Adjust is the mobile marketing analytics platform trusted by growth-driven marketers around the world, with solutions for measuring and optimizing campaigns and protecting user data. Adjust powers thousands of apps with built-in intelligence and automation, backed by responsive global customer support.
Adjust is a subsidiary of AppLovin (Nasdaq: APP), the leading growth platform for developers.

Your role:
As a Platform Engineer/SRE, you will take ownership in wrapping up the decentralisation of our infrastructure over various locations whilst continuously scale it. At the same time, you will make sure that our servers run smoothly and at their highest efficiency. You will work closely with our development and marketing teams to address their needs and scale out the infrastructure of our attribution pipeline and related technologies. In addition, you will continuously look for improvements, take on call shifts and execute solutions following your automation drive. With your strong JVM, Kafka, and/or Spark knowledge you will help us build more self-service offerings for our feature teams.

Description:
Darksn Strategic IT-Solution olarak, sahibi tarafından yönetilen stratejik bir BT hizmet sağlayıcısıyız. 2018 yılından bu yana BT sektöründe profesyonel, gelecek odaklı ve stratejik çözümleri temsil ediyor ve çok çeşitli sektörlerden orta ölçekli ve büyük şirketlere hitap ediyoruz.
Darksn IT, müşterilerine profesyonel süreç analizinden uygulamaya ve proje tamamlandıktan sonra bütünsel desteğe kadar tek bir kaynaktan geniş bir hizmet yelpazesi sunmaktadır. İş süreçleri yönetimi, BT güvenliği, bulut bilişim, iş zekası, web uygulamaları ve BT mimarisi bizi diğerlerinden ayıran temel yetkinliklerimizdir.
Aşağıdaki beceri ve niteliklere sahipseniz, sizi ilanımıza başvurmaya davet ediyoruz.

Description:
This role is based in Istanbul/Turkey. Hybrid office presence may be required.
ASP Retail Group operates global fashion brands through multiple e-commerce storefronts. Our flagship store has millions of followers, including influential social media personalities, our owned & operated distribution center and a visionary marketing/merchandising team.
We are growing quickly and looking for team members in various areas who are passionate about creating fashion forward and innovative consumer brands.
About The Role:
We're looking for Full Stack Software Engineers who are passionate about building a high performance & effective code that will power our internally developed e-commerce tech stack. You will be working directly with ecommerce and marketing teams to create cutting edge experiences on our website and administration tools.

Siemens Mobility (SMO) is the world’s leading provider of mobility solutions that enable the efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly transport of people and goods - and help improve the quality of everyday life for millions of people on all continents.
Motivated by innovation, we develop intelligent solutions for the growing digitalization of the transport sector. Our range of offerings includes rail vehicles, rail automation, road traffic management systems, rail electrification and services.
Today, we are recruiting for the “Planning Engineer” position for Siemens Mobility Turkey to join our Project Team in Turkey. This is an excellent career opportunity for professional talents from Rail /Transportation Business looking to join a truly international team.
Join Siemens Mobility and help us re-imagine the world by finding solutions and making the world a smarter place for tomorrow.

Company Description

Do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology – with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. Welcome to Bosch.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Our Exciting Opportunity

We are now looking for an EDA Support Engineer that will provide technical service and support to our customers. In this role, you will troubleshoot and resolve problems to stabilize and optimize customer networks. You will configure and integrate different nodes and solutions in new and live customer networks.

The Support Engineer typically interacts with customer technical staff, operation managers, service engineers and other groups within the Service Delivery organization. You may also interact with groups in sales, R&D, 3rd party suppliers and local authorities.

As there are no distinct borders between the areas, you will need to be flexible and master more than one area. You are expected to travel internationally and work in different cultural environments. The technical development is rapid, and you are responsible for continuously keeping your competence and skills up to date.

Description:
Adjust is the mobile marketing analytics platform trusted by growth-driven marketers around the world, with solutions for measuring and optimizing campaigns and protecting user data. Adjust powers thousands of apps with built-in intelligence and automation, backed by responsive global customer support.
Adjust is a subsidiary of AppLovin (Nasdaq: APP), the leading growth platform for developers.

Your role:
As a Platform Engineer/SRE, you will take ownership in wrapping up the decentralisation of our infrastructure over various locations whilst continuously scale it. At the same time, you will make sure that our servers run smoothly and at their highest efficiency. You will work closely with our development and marketing teams to address their needs and scale out the infrastructure of our attribution pipeline and related technologies. In addition, you will continuously look for improvements, take on call shifts and execute solutions following your automation drive. With your strong JVM, Kafka, and/or Spark knowledge you will help us build more self-service offerings for our feature teams.

General information: Hitachi Energy is the leading provider of mission critical communication products worldwide. We are looking for a professional in the fields of telecommunication products and systems to join our team in Istanbul (Turkey). You will design telecommunication solutions to meet the highest industry standards with regard to availability and reliability of operational and administrative communication systems. A technically challenging position in a multicultural environment awaits you.
Responsibilities: In cooperation with our customers or representatives, you will be responsible for the design and engineering of our telecommunication systems tailored to the requirements of the global energy sector during project execution. In the bidding phase you will support our sales and bid team with a professional design of communication networks based on customer specifications and design institutes. You integrate the customer's telecommunications structure in an optimal overall system. Moreover, you oversee the projects in all phases Occasionally, you travel to project meetings or to presentations at our customers location Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business
Your background: Successful degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent, ideally with specialized knowledge in Telecommunication networks with modern voice and data communication technologies (PLC / SDH / PDH / MPLS / DWDM / VoIP / MW / LTE). Sound knowledge of modern IP based telecommunication technologies. Good command of Russian and English, both verbal and written.. Flexibility and great communication skills as well as interests in working within an international and multicultural environment. In the end, you will surely convince us with great responsibility, innovative solutions and a strong customer orientation

Job_title: Senior Software Engineer – CargoWise Customs, Turkey
Description:
Autonomy, Mastery and Purpose. Our mission is to deliver breakthrough products that enable and empower those that own and operate the supply chains of the world. Our vision and mission drive everything that we do and are at the core of our strategy. Our people sit at the centre of all of this.
WiseTech Global provides the world’s most comprehensive solution for companies operating in the increasingly complex world of logistics. It has never been a more important time for organisations to have a resilient supply chain. Our industry-leading flagship product, CargoWise, is centralising logistics operations on a single global database, delivering business continuity, scalability and security.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

With an ecosystem of 5,000 locations and a team that's over 18,000 strong, REEF is the largest operator of parking real estate and delivery restaurants in America, Canada and the UK with a growing presence across Europe. Job_title: Senior Software Engineer – CargoWise Customs, Turkey
Description:
Autonomy, Mastery and Purpose. Our mission is to deliver breakthrough products that enable and empower those that own and operate the supply chains of the world. Our vision and mission drive everything that we do and are at the core of our strategy. Our people sit at the centre of all of this.
WiseTech Global provides the world’s most comprehensive solution for companies operating in the increasingly complex world of logistics. It has never been a more important time for organisations to have a resilient supply chain. Our industry-leading flagship product, CargoWise, is centralising logistics operations on a single global database, delivering business continuity, scalability and security.
At the very core of this is our CargoWise Native Customs functionality. This platform accounts for over 45% of global manufactured trade flows, a number that is growing year on year. The work you do in this team has a genuine, meaningful real world impact. So if you are an ambitious engineer, who wants to solve deeply complex problems with others of a similar mindset, read on.

Description:
Our Exciting Opportunity

We are now looking for an EDA Support Engineer that will provide technical service and support to our customers. In this role, you will troubleshoot and resolve problems to stabilize and optimize customer networks. You will configure and integrate different nodes and solutions in new and live customer networks.

The Support Engineer typically interacts with customer technical staff, operation managers, service engineers and other groups within the Service Delivery organization. You may also interact with groups in sales, R&D, 3rd party suppliers and local authorities.

As there are no distinct borders between the areas, you will need to be flexible and master more than one area. You are expected to travel internationally and work in different cultural environments. The technical development is rapid, and you are responsible for continuously keeping your competence and skills up to date.

Description:
Paymentology is the first truly global issuer-processor, giving banks and fintechs the technology, team and experience to rapidly issue and process Mastercard, Visa and UnionPay cards across more than 50 countries, at scale.

Our advanced, multi-cloud platform, offering both shared and dedicated processing instances, vast global presence and richer, real-time data, set us apart as the leader in payments.

In order to support our growth we are looking to hire a Senior React Engineer.

Tasks

As a Senior React Engineer at Paymentology you will be working in the Engineering team to build enterprise-level, highly scalable, highly secure financial processing systems that power tens of millions of transactions and tie them to web and mobile that make it easy for people to issue, redeem and reconcile prepaid and credit cards all over the world.

This position requires the ability to develop high-quality and resilient solutions to meet the rapidly evolving needs of an issuer processor serving an internationally expanding customer base and to communicate effectively at all levels, from providing the right level of details in status updates on your work to explaining technical trade-offs, technical complexities, and design options so Paymentology can make informed decisions.


Requirements




Benefits

At Paymentology we value making a difference to the lives of the people who work for us and who live in the communities where we operate. You can look forward to working with a diverse, global team where Paymentologists at all levels play an important part in our global mission to advance the world through payments and make a difference on a global scale.

Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

With an ecosystem of 5,000 locations and a team that's over 18,000 strong, REEF is the largest operator of parking real estate and delivery restaurants in America, Canada and the UK with a growing presence across Europe. By connecting the world to your block, we're making the place you live, the place you love to be.

Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Location: Istanbul
Post date: April, 2023
About Us
Customer experience management was complicated. We simplified it. Alterna CX solution helps companies measure and manage customer experience and get better results. Some of the most reputable companies in retail, insurance, and banking industries across four countries, including Akbank, Koçtaş, Sharekhan by BNP Paribas and IuteCredit, use Alterna CX.
About the Job

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share
Job Req Type: Experienced
Required Travel: Yes, 25% of the time
Shift Type: 1st Shift/Days

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Darksn Strategic IT-Solution olarak, sahibi tarafından yönetilen stratejik bir BT hizmet sağlayıcısıyız. 2018 yılından bu yana BT sektöründe profesyonel, gelecek odaklı ve stratejik çözümleri temsil ediyor ve çok çeşitli sektörlerden orta ölçekli ve büyük şirketlere hitap ediyoruz.
Darksn IT, müşterilerine profesyonel süreç analizinden uygulamaya ve proje tamamlandıktan sonra bütünsel desteğe kadar tek bir kaynaktan geniş bir hizmet yelpazesi sunmaktadır. İş süreçleri yönetimi, BT güvenliği, bulut bilişim, iş zekası, web uygulamaları ve BT mimarisi bizi diğerlerinden ayıran temel yetkinliklerimizdir.
Aşağıdaki beceri ve niteliklere sahipseniz, sizi ilanımıza başvurmaya davet ediyoruz.
Bilgisayar Mühendisliği, Yazılım Mühendisliği ve ilgili bölümlerinden mezun ekip arkadaşı arıyoruz

Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

Description:
We are looking for a Big Data Engineer who will work on the collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing of huge sets of data. The primary focus will be on choosing optimal solutions to use for these purposes, then maintaining, implementing, and monitoring them. You will also be responsible for integrating them with the architecture used across our clients
Responsibilities
Selecting and integrating any Big Data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities
Gather and process raw data at scale (including writing scripts, web scraping, calling APIs, write SQL queries, etc.)
Process unstructured data into a form suitable for analysis and then execute analysis

Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share
Job Req Type: Experienced
Required Travel: Yes, 25% of the time
Shift Type: 1st Shift/Days

Description:
About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,

A. Support distributors of responsible area to proceed the installation, maintenance, troubleshooting and end users visit of all Medcaptain products. Maintain the relationship with key customers and model hospitals, especially the relationship of the medical equipment management dept of the hospitals.
B. Provide technical support and conduct training to staff of distributors to be able to provide service to end users. Monitor the distributors’ service quality and maintain the customers’ satisfaction.
C. Collect and deal with the issues from distributors. Support distributor to handle the customer complain and major issue of responsible area.
D. Assist sale and marketing team to conduct product promotion and marketing support. Collect the installation information, customers’ requirements and competitors’ information and feedback to head quarter.
E. Manage the spare part stock and demo unit of responsible area.
F. Regularly output service experience and English/local language materials.
G. Develop and maintain Medcaptain brand at the local market.

Job_title: Service Engineer - Turbocharging / Servis Mühendisi - Turbocharging (80-100%)
Description:
As a Service Engineer, you will execute service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Accelleron standard processes, quality standards, and safety guidelines. Reporting to the Service Coordinator, you will cooperate closely with customers and other Accelleron teams, acting as the technical point while delivering quality and satisfying customer service. In this role, you will be responsible for providing routine maintenance and on-site or remote technical support. The position involves frequent traveling, as you will be providing hands-on assistance at customer sites.
Your responsibilities
Drive customer satisfaction by competent and timely execution of a high-quality level of service jobs on-site and in the workshop.

Job_title: Full stack Developer - Angular deneyimli önemli - Remote
Description:
Darksn Strategic IT-Solution olarak, sahibi tarafından yönetilen stratejik bir BT hizmet sağlayıcısıyız. 2018 yılından bu yana BT sektöründe profesyonel, gelecek odaklı ve stratejik çözümleri temsil ediyor ve çok çeşitli sektörlerden orta ölçekli ve büyük şirketlere hitap ediyoruz.
Darksn IT, müşterilerine profesyonel süreç analizinden uygulamaya ve proje tamamlandıktan sonra bütünsel desteğe kadar tek bir kaynaktan geniş bir hizmet yelpazesi sunmaktadır. İş süreçleri yönetimi, BT güvenliği, bulut bilişim, iş zekası, web uygulamaları ve BT mimarisi bizi diğerlerinden ayıran temel yetkinliklerimizdir.
Aşağıdaki beceri ve niteliklere sahipseniz, sizi ilanımıza başvurmaya davet ediyoruz.
Bilgisayar Mühendisliği, Yazılım Mühendisliği ve ilgili bölümlerinden mezun ekip arkadaşı arıyoruz

Company_name: ALKAN İNŞAAT MÜHENDİSLİK TURİZM TAŞ. SAN. VE TİC. LTD. ŞTİ.
Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

Our automated network management products and services empower mobile operators to accelerate network transformation and to drive network quality and efficiency on the path to 5G. These solutions have been deployed across more than 67 mobile operators in 47 countries around the world.

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share
Job Req Type: Experienced
Required Travel: Yes, 25% of the time
Shift Type: 1st Shift/Days

Description:
About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
Location: Istanbul
Post date: April, 2023
About Us
Customer experience management was complicated. We simplified it. Alterna CX solution helps companies measure and manage customer experience and get better results. Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market. This involves working with customers, sales teams and products lines to identify key opportunities and position the best solutions tailored to customer needs to grow Analog Devices market share

About Vision:
Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Faladdin also has a natural and mystical story behind its character, Sertaç Taşdelen, who is also the Co-Founder of Faladdin.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. Vision Technology is a pioneer software and artificial intelligence research company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create sustainable technologies that benefit all of humanity. We pride ourselves on being a company that develops products on a global scale. Our 'very' name Vision refers to our forward-thinking and bold approach to problems we face, and we strive to achieve a significant impact on the history of humankind. Our current three products are Faladdin, Binnaz and Vimbo.
Faladdin is an Astrology & Fortune Telling App downloaded by over 25 million users from around the globe. It's available in English, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic languages and recently hit no:10 in the U.S. market App Store! It's an AI-based application offering individual analysis about life by combining deep learning skills and ancient knowledge of mystical disciplines like Tarot, Astrology, Clairvoyance, and exotic Coffee Cup Reading and become like a good friend of its users. Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Autonomous Driving Software Engineer:
We are looking for a software engineer to participate in the development of autonomous robotics platforms, who has the ability to implement algorithms that run on an autonomous robot in real-time.
Responsibilities:
Engage in a current project to accelerate the development, debugging and testing process.
Adapt with the team to get the current state and build upon the current work.
Get along with the development methodology and remark on future optimization refactoring.

Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Company_name: ALKAN İNŞAAT MÜHENDİSLİK TURİZM TAŞ. SAN. VE TİC. LTD. ŞTİ.
Description:
Hakkımızda
1995’te kurulan şirketimiz, var olduğu tarihten beri sektörde öncü olma fikriyle, hizmetlerini sürdürmektedir. Alanında yetkin mühendis kadromuzla, çiftçilerin bitki yetiştirme sürecinde ihtiyaç duyduğu bilimsel müdahaleleri zamanında ve çiftçilerin deneyimlerine uyumlu olarak gerçekleştirmekteyiz.
Teknolojik alt yapıyı etkin ve verimli kullanan ama aynı zamanda ekolojik dengeye zarar vermeyecek üretim politikalarını benimseyen şirketimiz, yerel gücünü bölgesel ve küresel etkinliğe dönüştürmektedir.
Çiftçilerimizi kaliteli ürünlerle buluşturmak, akabinde sahip olduğumuz bilgi ve teknolojik alt yapıyı çiftçilerimizin hizmetine sunmak ve bu sayede çiftçilerimizin maksimum maddi tatminini sağlamak, şirketimizin bugüne kadar takip ettiği ve bundan sonra da sıkıca devam ettireceği hizmet politikalarıdır.

Description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.
Analog Devices currently produces a wide range of innovative products - including data converters, amplifiers and linear products, radio frequency (RF) ICs, power management products, sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) technology and other sensors, and processing products, including DSP and other processors - that are designed to meet the needs of our broad base of customers.
The Candidate will provide field applications support, pre-sales and post-sales technical support to Strategic and Key customers for Analog Devices products used Aerospace and Defense market.
