Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

Description:
Ready to get to know us?
We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. Since then we have grown into a decacorn with a valuation of over $16.5 billion, backed by Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital, and several sovereign wealth funds. Operating with that same energy from the first day, we believe we will achieve our targets and grow even more together!

May the tech be with us.
From day one, we believed that technology is the driver; e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to our dedicated team, we are now one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies in the world! Now we’re a team in our thousands, currently delivering more than 1.5 million packages every day to 27 countries. We offer our 30 million customers a flawless shopping experience.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Data Engineer
Do you want to be a valued part of the critical infrastructure that serves communities across Europe and beyond? If so, then you could be the newest addition to our team as Data Engineer.

About the role
Be part of the role movement – and play your part.
As a Data Engineer in Data & Analytics, you will become part of an agile team that builds innovative end-to-end data products, using both descriptive and predictive analytics across many exciting business domains within DFDS. You come to be a part of an international team with many nationalities and locations across the EU.
We are an evolving team, where you with the right skill- and mindset, could have a high level of influence on the way solutions are built. We are modernizing our analytics setup; hence you will play a vital role in designing and developing data infrastructure using traditional DWH and ETL technologies but moving towards a cloud-based setup with event streaming and serverless.
As a Data Engineer in Data & Analytics, you will primarily be responsible for building data pipelines (both centralized and decentralized) that support the different business initiatives together with other data engineers, back-end developers, data scientists, and product owners. All from identifying, collecting, and integrating data from various sources to building robust and scalable domain-based data products (on-prem and cloud) for analytical purposes.
You will also require participating in change management initiatives to support the adoption and continuous development of our data solutions and platform.

Key Skills & Competencies Required:

We think the strongest teams are built on diversity and inclusivity. Contrasting opinions, varied skills and strong characters bring out the best in us all. If you think you have this mindset, we invite you to meet with us.

The ideal person for this position will have following qualifications:

Working at DFDS

Join the movement and grow with us.
While you’re with us, we want you to develop and move yourself on. We’ll encourage you to challenge yourself to acquire new skills and perspectives.

Are we a match? Then what are you waiting for? Apply now.

If you think your personality, skills, experience, and ambition match this role, we’d love to hear from you. Send us your resume as soon as possible as we’re keen to meet potential candidates on an ongoing basis.
Is there something you need to know, we haven’t covered here, please do not hesitate to reach out to Hanife Turan on hatua@dfds.com

We look forward to hearing from you.

Description:
Job Description
Doktar is an Agritech company with the purpose of improving food systems through intensive use of data and data-driven decisions. To fulfill its purpose, Doktar delivers a palette of digital services to the entire agricultural value chain. Doktar is positioned as a one-stop-shop for digital agriculture solutions, which requires us to develop and deliver a set of services based on emerging technologies, such as remote sensing, the internet of things, machine learning and artificial intelligence.

We are looking for a Python Developer who will be responsible for the end-to end development of data infrastructure features, from design to production.

P.I. Works is the first company in the world to automate the management of a commercial 5G network.

Our automated network management products and services empower mobile operators to accelerate network transformation and to drive network quality and efficiency on the path to 5G. These solutions have been deployed across more than 63 mobile operators in 45 countries around the world.

Come and join us to work with the leading telecom operators around the world and redefine the mobile experience worldwide by contributing to our research and development efforts.
